title: IT Security Engineer (f/m/d)
body:
We are expanding rapidly and hence, we are seeking new, experienced and hands-on team members who think outside of the box (and are not afraid to share their thoughts), will deliver unique ideas and like to work in a fast-paced environment.

Your mission
As an IT Security Engineer at Bitpanda, you will be responsible for identifying and resolving security issues, as well as implementing countermeasures to ensure robust and reliable systems

Your focus

  • Contribute to all levels of the architecture from a security perspective
  • Serve as a security expert during the whole development process and mitigate security vulnerabilities
  • Establishing a security operation center, including central monitoring
  • Plan and perform penetration tests on web-based and mobile applications
  • Perform system analysis, research best practice security solutions and advise

Why you

  • +5 years proven professional experience as a system security engineer or information security engineer
  • Hands-on experience in security systems, including firewalls, intrusion detection systems, anti-virus software, log management and network security
  • Solid technical skills in information security architecture, vulnerability testing and penetration testing
  • Experience with common threat modeling and risk analysis framework
Why us

Come and join our international and collaborative work environment as we strive towards our vision of accelerating the transition to a tokenised world. Apply today to help shape the future of investing.

For this position the salary range lies between €41,000- €69,000 gross per year. Our final offer will depend on your skills and experience.

In addition, Bitpanda offers attractive benefits:
  • Flexible working hours
  • Latest hardware
  • Lunch and gym discount
  • Regular team events and a yearly team trip
  • Modern office in the Viennese Fintech Hub
  • Buddy programme
  • Beginner German classes

For any questions, please check our FAQ
See you soon!
